lines.text: When a man pulls shit on me he is either very brave or very stoned. Which one are you?
Don't touch me!
There's something about your face that makes me want to slap the shit out of it!
You're after something... and it ain't my pussy!
I want you to know what we know so your mind will be clear, you dig?

[narrating]
And as the sun sets slowly in the west, we say goodbye to beautiful Palm Springs, oasis of intrigue and extracurricular games of Hide the Salami, and we return to real life.
I must have thought I was falling in love. What an asshole.
"Tit in the Wringer, or How Harry Mitchell Agreed to Pay One Hundred and Five Thou a Year and Found Happiness."

[narrating, as Cini is shown being handcuffed and bound to a chair]
Some people, you gotta tie down to convince 'em they can act.

[narrating, as Cini's blouse is ripped off]
This is to keep your interest, or whatever, up.
Who are you?
"We satisfy or we eat it."
So, gentlemen, we got a little problem. We killed somebody, he saw it on the movie, and now he knows about us. That's why one of us is going to have to blow him away.
[long silence, as Bobby realizes Alan and Leo are staring at him]
Now, what do I get out of it?
Peace of mind.
I look nervous to you?
[Alan is showing a snuff film in which a girl is shot]
The best thing about Cini is that she not only lives her part, she dies it too.
I could be walking into something.
Buddy, you could be walking into surgery.

[Alan has stolen Harry's gun]
You're hoping for something like this going in, but never in a million years can it happen.
Clean living. It pays off.
You a cop?
You wanna look in my wallet? Pat me down?
You're the one who seems to want to do the patting.

[taking pictures of Doreen as she strips]
The last one was underexposed.
Oh, yeah? And I say wait 'til I get my pants off, you want more exposure.
That's pretty good.
Or, as the dude says, "What size is your aperture?"
A lot of laughs in your business, huh?
Then I asked the guy, I said, "Who told you where to find me?" Oh, he said it was you.
I didn't tell him! Jesus Christ! I didn't even tell him your first name!
OK! It could have been someone else!
All right, what about Doreen, huh? I mean, she went out with him!
She wouldn't talk to him.
How do you know that?
Because she's a friend of mine. And she knows if I found out, I'd throw her dead ass off a roof.

[hands Bobby a glass of liquor]
Drink this.
Shit. Motherfucker busts in your house, you always serve him drinks?

[to Bobby]
Oh, I've got something to show you. Something that is gonna knock... you... out!
[takes out a gun and shoots Bobby through the heart]
